io.codeleaf.config.spec

Interface SpecificationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpecificationCache, SpecificationServiceLoader

    public interface SpecificationProvider
    This class is used to obtain specifications.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    tvburger@gmail.com

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SpecificationProvider.Holder
      Holder for a singleton, to obtain the singleton, use get()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SpecificationProvider get()
      Returns a SpecificationProvider to load configurations
      Specification getSpecification(String specificationName)
      Returns the specification with the specified name
      boolean hasSpecification(String specificationName)
      Returns true if the provider contains the specified specification

    • Method Detail

      • get

        static SpecificationProvider get()
        Returns a SpecificationProvider to load configurations
        Returns:
        a SpecificationProvider
        Throws:
        ExceptionInInitializerError - if the Holder is lazy initialized and during initialization an exception was thrown

      • hasSpecification

        boolean hasSpecification(String specificationName)
        Returns true if the provider contains the specified specification
        Parameters:
        specificationName - the name of specification
        Returns:
        true if the provider contains the specified specification

      • getSpecification

        Specification getSpecification(String specificationName)
                        throws SpecificationNotFoundException,
                               IOException,
                               SpecificationFormatException
        Returns the specification with the specified name
        Parameters:
        specificationName - the name of the specification
        Returns:
        the specification
        Throws:
        SpecificationNotFoundException - when no specification is found with the given name
        IOException - when an exception occurred during reading the configuration
        SpecificationFormatException - if the specification has the wrong format
        See Also:
        SpecificationLoader
